testcase.name: test_send_message
testcase.failure: backend/tests/test_mega_features.py:414: in test_send_message assert response.status_code == 201, f"Expected 201, got {response.status_code}: {response.text}" E AssertionError: Expected 201, got 200: {"message_id":"msg_8db2efd39ad0","group_id":"group_b349e7f83d31","user_id":"user_03e4c11ee95a","user_name":"Mega Feature Tester","user_picture":null,"content":"Hello, this is a test message!","message_type":"text","created_at":"2026-01-24T19:43:48.167032+00:00"} E assert 200 == 201 E + where 200 = <Response [200]>.status_code

testcase.name: test_create_group_goal
